summary: Quarantine Categories page migration from Settings to dedicated page - All features verified working correctly. Sidebar menu item added, navigation works, full CRUD operations (Add/Edit/Delete) functional, Master Data tab removed from Settings.
passed_tests: Sidebar menu item 'Quarantine Categories' exists and visible
QuarantineCategoriesPage loads with proper UI elements (title, description, Add button)
Add Category: Click 'Add Category' button shows form with Value and Label inputs
Add Category: Fill form and click 'Create Category' creates new category successfully
Add Category: Toast notification 'Quarantine category created' appears
Edit Category: Click edit button switches row to edit mode with editable inputs
Edit Category: Cancel and Save buttons appear in edit mode
Delete Category: Delete button visible for each category row
Delete Category: Click delete triggers confirmation dialog
Delete Category: Confirming delete removes category and shows 'Quarantine category deleted' toast
Settings page no longer has 'Master Data' tab
Settings page tabs: Branding, Timezone, SEO Notifications, Domain Monitoring, Email Alerts, Templates, Performance Alerts
critical_code_review_comments: GOOD: QuarantineCategoriesPage.jsx properly uses data-testid attributes for all interactive elements
GOOD: Layout.jsx correctly adds new sidebar menu item with ShieldAlert icon and proper menuKey
GOOD: App.js correctly routes /settings/quarantine-categories to QuarantineCategoriesPage with menu permission check
GOOD: SettingsPage.jsx Master Data tab successfully removed
GOOD: Access control implemented - only Super Admin users can access the page (isSuperAdmin check)
GOOD: Proper loading states and error handling with toast notifications
seed_data_creation: Created test category 'test_1770910349' (later deleted in testing)

features_verified.sidebar_menu_item: Quarantine Categories menu item visible in sidebar with ShieldAlert icon, positioned before Settings menu item
features_verified.page_ui: Page shows title 'Quarantine Categories', subtitle 'Manage quarantine reasons for domains', and Card with 'Category Management' section
features_verified.add_category: Add Category button opens inline form with Value (slug) and Display Label inputs, auto-converts to lowercase with underscores
features_verified.edit_category: Edit button switches row to edit mode with Save/Cancel buttons
features_verified.delete_category: Delete button triggers browser confirm dialog, successful deletion shows toast and updates list
features_verified.settings_tab_removal: Master Data tab no longer exists on Settings page

context_for_next_testing_agent: Quarantine Categories management UI has been moved from Settings page to its own dedicated page at /settings/quarantine-categories. All CRUD operations work correctly. Test credentials: superadmin@seonoc.com / SuperAdmin123!
